IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE THE HIGHEST STANDARD OF HOME CARE TO THE PEOPLE IN OUR COMMUNITIES, ALWAYS TREATING THEM WITH DIGNITY, COMPASSION AND RESPECT.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To provide the highest standard of home care to the people in our communities, always treating them with dignity, compassion and respect.
IRS990.Description: Home Care - provides acute health and hospice care services to patients that can be cared for at home.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: State law allows the Board to appropriate so much of the net appreciation of permanently restricted net assets as is prudent considering the Agencys long and short-term needs, present and anticipated financial requirements, and expected total return on its investments, price level trends, and general economic conditions. The endowment assets are pooled with investments held at Healthcare Charities, a related party listed on schedule R. Investment earnings are allocated quarterly, on a proportional basis to the fund.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 4
Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The sole Member of this Corporation shall be Eastern Maine Health Care Systems.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Member shall have the power to elect or remove the Directors of the Corporation.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 7b
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Decisions of the governing body are subject to approval by EMHS, the parent corporation and sole member of EMHC.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: cfo reviews the 990 prior to the ceo signing it.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: annual review of policy and members are required to sign.
